basicFeatures.title: Hiring
basicFeatures.name: hiring
basicFeatures.content: Create job applications, post jobs & use our applicant tracking system, making it easy to hire in a few clicks.

basicFeatures.title: Onboarding
basicFeatures.name: onboarding
basicFeatures.content: Paperless employee onboarding. Bring your entire onboarding process online by turning your custom forms like handbooks & contracts into digital documents.

basicFeatures.title: Payroll
basicFeatures.name: payroll
basicFeatures.content: Guided payroll experience that allows you to run payroll in minutes, not hours. 2 simple steps; review & submit.
